name: Ashutosh Gajraj
label: AI Enthusiast
summary: I am a motivated student pursuing my studies in artificial intelligence, which is also said to be the upcoming ‘Industrial Revolution’. I want to be at the forefront of research in AI, pushing the boundaries of current technology and develop technologies which is beneficial to the society. I see artificial intelligence as a transformative force which has the ability to change the way society functions currently. I want to be a part of this exciting technology which holds limitless potential.

highlights: Currently serving as the general secretary for the KUAI Club for the year 2025.
Maintaining proper event reports and meeting’s documentations and managing correspondence.
Have organized events like bootcamps, workshops for general members in collaboration with KUAI Club executives.
Wrote a complete documentation of the event describing its objectives and impacts on pushing technological innovation in our society
Interacted with the participants and recorded their experience, feedbacks and and summary of their projects
Volunteered in the event to help successfully carry out the program

experiences.summary: Served as a deputy secretary general in my high school’s STEM club and helped organize various workshops, competitions like inter-school Mathematics Olympiads
highlights: Conducted weekly club-meetings to discuss about various club-agendas and wrote minutes about the meeting’s briefing, summary and club’s future works.
Wrote proposals to seek permission from the school’s principal for organizing events
Successfully conducted Xavier Mathematics Olympiad 2.0 in November, 2022

experiences.summary: Served as a executive/board member in Xavier Innovation and Entrepreneurship Club during high school and helped conduct workshops and events
highlights: Participated in weekly club-meetings to discuss and share ideas/advices about clubs activities and future plans
Helped organize a workshop on innovation and entrepreneurship as an organising committee in December, 2022

experiences.summary: Served as a class representative in high school for a year
highlights: Participated in Student’s Representative Seminar conducted in July, 2022.
Helped manage the classroom during teacher’s absence
Relayed information and updates to my classmates regarding academics and college
Recorded each class period’s timing and syllabus taught daily

projects.title: Medicinal Herbs Classification
highlights: Developed a deep learning model using ResNet50, DenseNet121, and VGG16 to classify 96 classes of medicinal plants.
Faced data collection challenges due to rare high-altitude plants and plan to expand dataset for further accuracy improvement.

projects.title: Nepali News Summarizer and Text-to-Speech (TTS)
highlights: Fine-tuned XTTSv2 for Nepali language, utilizing google’s open source dataset of recorded audio and transcriptions
Built a Streamlit web app that summarizes Nepali news articles and converts summaries into speech using TTS
Integrated file upload and text input options for flexible user interaction and efficient information consumption.

education.gpa_cumulative: Sem I: 4.0, Sem II : 3.89, Sem III: 3.77, Sem IV: Result pending
